description: Deep dive into Ella Core performance with CPU profiling, memory analysis, and detailed logs.

panels.description: Average CPU cores used by the Ella Core process. This measures Go runtime CPU usage and does not include XDP/eBPF packet processing which runs in kernel space.
panels.title: CPU Cores

panels.description: Current heap memory in use by Ella Core. High values may indicate memory leaks or inefficient allocations.
panels.title: Heap Memory

panels.description: Number of active goroutines. A steadily increasing count may indicate goroutine leaks.
panels.title: Goroutines

panels.description: Rate of NGAP messages processed per second. NGAP is the control plane protocol between radios (gNBs) and the core network.
panels.title: NGAP Rate

panels.description: Rate of HTTP API requests per second (excluding metrics and pprof endpoints).
panels.title: API Rate

panels.description: Rate of database queries per second across all tables and operations.
panels.title: DB Query Rate

panels.description: Rate of NGAP messages by message type. Useful for understanding control plane traffic patterns.
panels.title: NGAP Message Rate by Type

panels.description: Rate of API requests excluding internal endpoints (metrics, pprof). Breakdown by endpoint available in legend.
panels.title: API Request Rate by Endpoint

panels.description: Rate of database queries by table and operation type. Helps identify hot spots in database access patterns.
panels.title: DB Query Rate by Operation

panels.description: CPU cores used by the Ella Core Go process over time. Click "View flame graph" to identify CPU-intensive functions.
panels.title: CPU Usage Over Time

panels.description: Heap memory usage over time. Correlate spikes with specific operations using the flame graph.
panels.title: Heap Memory Over Time

panels.description: Go garbage collection metrics. GC Time shows seconds spent in GC per second (should be <5%). GC Pause P99 shows the 99th percentile pause duration - high values cause latency spikes.
panels.title: Garbage Collection

panels.description: API request latency percentiles. P50 is the median, P95 covers most requests, P99 shows tail latency. High P99 with normal P50 indicates occasional slow requests.
panels.title: API Latency (P50/P95/P99)

panels.description: Number of API requests returning 5xx errors in the selected time range (excluding pprof and metrics endpoints).
panels.title: Error Requests

panels.description: Maximum trace duration (slowest request) in the selected time range.
panels.title: Max Duration

panels.description: Recent traces from Ella Core. Click on a Trace ID to view the full span timeline.
panels.title: Recent Traces

panels.description: Traces exceeding 1ms duration. These may indicate performance bottlenecks. Click on a Trace ID to investigate.
panels.title: Slow NGAP Traces (>1ms)

panels.description: Application logs from Ella Core. Use the component and level labels to filter. Click on a log line to see all structured fields.
panels.title: Application Logs

panels.description: CPU flame graph showing which functions consume the most CPU time. Wider bars indicate more CPU usage. Use this to identify optimization opportunities.
panels.title: CPU Profile

panels.description: Memory allocation flame graph showing which functions allocate the most heap memory. Use this to identify memory-intensive operations and potential leaks.
panels.title: Memory Profile

list.description: Select the Ella Core job. This filters metrics and logs (requires matching job labels in your Alloy/collector config).
list.label: Job
list.name: job

list.description: Select the Ella Core instance (host:port). This filters metrics and logs.
list.label: Instance
list.name: instance

list.description: Pyroscope service name for CPU/memory profiling
list.label: Profile Service
list.name: pyroscope_service

list.description: Tempo/OTEL service name for distributed traces
list.label: Trace Service
list.name: trace_service

list.description: Optional: Filter traces by tag (e.g., host.name=raspberrypi). Leave empty for all traces.
list.label: Trace Filter
list.name: trace_host

list.description: Filter logs by component (amf, smf, upf, api, etc.)
list.label: Component
list.name: component

list.description: Filter logs by severity (info, warn, error)
list.label: Level
list.name: level

title: Ella Core Deep Dive
